messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] re: missed the winkie was: manners
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/22/03 8:43:55 PM Pacific Daylight Time, ... OK so I just posted that I would stop posting on this thread, but in the meanwhile this post
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/22/03 8:43:55 PM Pacific Daylight Time,
pamsoroosh@... writes:

> Rhonda -- see the winky?
>

OK so I just posted that I would stop posting on this thread, but in the
meanwhile this post from Pam came through. So I didn't see it before saying I'd
stop. So I just want to say, thanx for pointing it out Pam, I did not see it and
when you said ---see the winky? I had to look again. So thanx for pointing it
out.

Rhonda - winking at the whole list


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
